title: Nicolas Rojo
text:
Computational Chemist focused on molecular modeling, scientific computing and theoretical methods.
            
            
                Computational Chemistry
                Molecular Simulation
                Quantum Methods
            
        
        
    



    Education
    
    
        MSc in Theoretical Chemistry & Computational Modeling
        Universidad Autónoma de Madrid
    
    
    
        BSc in Chemistry
        Universidad Autónoma de Madrid
    



    Experience
    
    
        Research Assistant — Universidad Complutense de Madrid (UCM)
        Computational modeling, data analysis and scientific computing applied to chemical systems.
    
    
    
        Private Tutor — Chemistry & Mathematics
        One-to-one teaching focused on problem solving and conceptual understanding.
